verses.verse: And all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H5414>cried<s%>; and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%>.

And all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and against <S%H175>Aaron<s%>: and the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3863>them<s%>, Would that we had <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>! or <S%H3863>would<s%> that we had <S%H4191>died<s%> in this <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>!

And wherefore doth <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> us unto this <S%H776>land<s%>, to <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>? Our <S%H802>wives<s%> and our little <S%H2945>ones<s%> will be a <S%H957>prey<s%>: were it not <S%H2896>better<s%> for us to <S%H7725>return<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>?
And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another<s%>, Let us <S%H5414>make<s%> a <S%H7218>captain<s%>, and let us <S%H7725>return<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%>, who were of them that <S%H8446>spied<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H7167>rent<s%> their <S%H899>clothes<s%>:

and they <S%H559>spake<s%> unto all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H776>land<s%>, which we <S%H5674>passed<s%> through to <S%H8446>spy<s%> it <S%H3966>out<s%>, is an exceeding <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>.

If <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H2654>delight<s%> in <S%H935>us<s%>, then he will bring us into this <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto <S%H776>us<s%>; a land which <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>.

Only <S%H4775>rebel<s%> not against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, neither <S%H3372>fear<s%> ye the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>; for they are <S%H3899>bread<s%> for <S%H6738>us<s%>: their defence is <S%H5493>removed<s%> from over <S%H3068>them<s%>, and Jehovah is with <S%H3372>us<s%>: fear them not.

But all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H559>bade<s%> <S%H7275>stone<s%> them with <S%H68>stones<s%>. And the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> unto all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, How long will this <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5006>despise<s%> <S%H3808>me<s%>? and how long will they not <S%H539>believe<s%> in <S%H226>me<s%>, for all the signs which I have <S%H6213>wrought<s%> among <S%H7130>them<s%>?

I will <S%H5221>smite<s%> them with the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, and <S%H3423>disinherit<s%> <S%H6213>them<s%>, and will make of thee a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> and mightier than <S%H6099>they<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Then the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H5927>it<s%>; for thou broughtest up this <S%H5971>people<s%> in thy <S%H3581>might<s%> from among <S%H7130>them<s%>;

and they will <S%H559>tell<s%> it to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of this <S%H776>land<s%>. They have <S%H8085>heard<s%> that thou <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> art in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%>; for thou <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> art <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5869>face<s%> to <S%H5869>face<s%>, and thy <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5975>standeth<s%> over <S%H1980>them<s%>, and thou goest <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5982>them<s%>, in a pillar of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%>, and in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>.

Now if thou shalt <S%H4191>kill<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, then the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8088>fame<s%> of thee will <S%H559>speak<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Because <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto <S%H7819>them<s%>, therefore he hath slain them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.
And <S%H3581>now<s%>, I pray thee, let the power of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> be <S%H1431>great<s%>, <S%H834>according<s%> as thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is slow to <S%H750>anger<s%>, and <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, <S%H5375>forgiving<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and <S%H6588>transgression<s%>; and that will by no <S%H5352>means<s%> <S%H5352>clear<s%> the <S%H6485>guilty<s%>, visiting the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> upon the <S%H1121>children<s%>, upon the <S%H8029>third<s%> and upon the fourth <S%H7256>generation<s%>.

Pardon <S%H5545><s%>, I pray <S%H5771>thee<s%>, the iniquity of this <S%H5971>people<s%> according unto the <S%H1433>greatness<s%> of thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, and according as thou hast <S%H5375>forgiven<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%>, from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> even until <S%H2008>now<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I have <S%H5545>pardoned<s%> according to thy <S%H1697>word<s%>:
but in very <S%H199>deed<s%>, as I <S%H2416>live<s%>, and as all the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>;

because all those <S%H582>men<s%> that have <S%H7200>seen<s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%>, and my <S%H226>signs<s%>, which I <S%H6213>wrought<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, yet have <S%H5254>tempted<s%> me these <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%>, and have not <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> to my <S%H6963>voice<s%>;

surely they shall <S%H518>not<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, neither shall any of them that <S%H5006>despised<s%> me see <S%H7200>it<s%>:

but my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%>, <S%H6118>because<s%> he had <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> with <S%H310>him<s%>, and hath followed me <S%H4390>fully<s%>, him will I <S%H935>bring<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> whereinto he <S%H935>went<s%>; and his <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall possess <S%H3423>it<s%>.

Now the <S%H6003>Amalekite<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%>: <S%H4279>to-morrow<s%> <S%H6437>turn<s%> <S%H5265>ye<s%>, and get you into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

How long shall I bear with this <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, that <S%H3885>murmur<s%> against <S%H8085>me<s%>? I have heard the <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which they murmur against <S%H3885>me<s%>.

Say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H2416>them<s%>, As I live, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, surely <S%H3808>as<s%> ye have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in mine <S%H241>ears<s%>, so will I do to <S%H6213>you<s%>:

your dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in this <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>; and all that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H4557>you<s%>, according to your whole number, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, that have murmured against <S%H3885>me<s%>,

surely ye shall <S%H518>not<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%>, concerning which I <S%H3027>sware<s%> that I would make you <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H3612>therein<s%>, save Caleb the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%>, and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>.

But your little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, that ye <S%H559>said<s%> should be a <S%H957>prey<s%>, them will I bring <S%H935>in<s%>, and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which ye have <S%H3988>rejected<s%>.
But as for <S%H6297>you<s%>, your dead bodies shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in this <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

And your <S%H1121>children<s%> shall be <S%H7462>wanderers<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> your <S%H2184>whoredoms<s%>, until your dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> be <S%H8552>consumed<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

After the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3117>days<s%> in which ye <S%H8446>spied<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%>, even <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, for every <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H3117>year<s%>, shall ye <S%H5375>bear<s%> your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>, even <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H8569>alienation<s%>.

I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, have <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, <S%H518>surely<s%> this will I <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2063>unto<s%> all this <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, that are gathered <S%H3259>together<s%> against <S%H4057>me<s%>: in this wilderness they shall be <S%H8552>consumed<s%>, and there they shall <S%H4191>die<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%>, whom <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H8446>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%>, who <S%H7725>returned<s%>, and made all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> to <S%H3885>murmur<s%> against <S%H3318>him<s%>, by bringing up an evil <S%H1681>report<s%> against the <S%H776>land<s%>,

even <S%H582>those<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> that did bring <S%H3318>up<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1681>report<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H4191>died<s%> by the <S%H4046>plague<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

But <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%>, remained <S%H2421>alive<s%> of those <S%H1992>men<s%> that <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H8446>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>land<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>told<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> unto all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H56>mourned<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%>.

And they rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and gat them <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H2009>Lo<s%>, we are <S%H5927>here<s%>, and will go up unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H559>promised<s%>: for we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Wherefore now do ye <S%H5674>transgress<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, seeing it shall not <S%H6743>prosper<s%>?
Go not <S%H5927>up<s%>, for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is not <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H5062>you<s%>; that ye be not smitten down <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%>.

For there the <S%H6003>Amalekite<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> are <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5307>you<s%>, and ye shall fall by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>: because ye are <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H310>back<s%> from following <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, therefore Jehovah will not be with <S%H3068>you<s%>.

But they <S%H6075>presumed<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>: nevertheless the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H4185>departed<s%> not <S%H4185>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.

Then the <S%H6003>Amalekite<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%>, and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> who <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in that <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> them and <S%H3807>beat<s%> them <S%H2767>down<s%>, even unto Hormah.
